Parameters: the status code of the addGeofences operation. Possible status code @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationStatusCodes#SUCCESS_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationStatusCodes#GEOFENCE_TOO_MANY_GEOFENCES_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationStatusCodes#GEOFENCE_TOO_MANY_PENDING_INTENTS_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationStatusCodes#GEOFENCE_NOT_AVAILABLE_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationStatusCodes#ERROR_E@.
the list of geofence request IDs extracted from the List<Geofence> provided to the original @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationClient#addGeofences_E@ call
onAddGeofencesResult(int, java.lang.Stri.Description: Called when the @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationClient#addGeofences_E@ operation completes successfully or unsuccessfully.
onAddGeofencesResult(int, java.lang.Stri.FullName: public abstract void onAddGeofencesResult (int statusCode, String[] geofenceRequestIds)

ClassDesc: The listener for receiving callbacks when the operation to add geofences completes.
